title: Customer Billing Dispute - International Roaming
description: A customer is disputing high charges after traveling internationally, claiming they were unaware of roaming fees.

tasks.description: Retrieve customer account and the specific billing statement with roaming charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and the bill in question.

tasks.description: Check the customer's plan details to confirm if it includes an international roaming package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer's plan does not include free roaming.

tasks.description: Review account history for any pre-travel notifications sent regarding roaming charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a record of an SMS notification sent when the customer first connected abroad.

tasks.description: Explain the standard roaming rates and offer to retroactively add a one-week international pass to reduce the bill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the policy and successfully applies a travel pass to lower the customer's bill.
